name: Teeth and Concrete
description:
A street-level superhero adaption of the BOLT RPG Engine. A game about getting hurt, about burning out, and about fighting for your City regardless.

Written by someone who’s also quite burnt out.

Image based on a photo taken by Peter Enyeart of the Charles River after a February 2015 snowstorm. https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:2015_February_snow_on_Charles_River_in_Boston_Massachusetts_USA_16380547417.jpg
